Title: Relates to interest upon judgment
Summary: Provides that where summary judgment is denied to a plaintiff, which denial is thereafter reversed on appeal and granted in favor of such plaintiff, any money judgment entered in favor of the plaintiff thereafter shall bear interest from the date of entry of the prior denial of such motion for summary judgment as if summary judgment had in fact been granted to such plaintiff in the first instance.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil practice law and rules, in relation to interest upon judgment
